dismiss.label: Dismiss {count, plural, =1 {waitlist entry} other {# waitlist entries}}
dismiss.title: Are you absolutely sure?
dismiss.description: This action cannot be undone. This will dismiss the waitlist entry

tab.title: Wait list
tab.caughtUp: You've caught up on all requests. Good job!

app.description:
Wait list helps you capture and manage customer demand when your schedule is full.
Easily allow clients to join a waiting list for specific services, dates, or times

email.label: Email
email.tooltip: Email address to send notifications to

notifyOnNewEntry.label: Send yourself email on new entry
notifyOnNewEntry.tooltip: Send notification to yourself when a new entry is added to the wait list

notifyCustomerOnNewEntry.label: Send customer email on new entry
notifyCustomerOnNewEntry.tooltip: Send notification to customer when a new entry is added to the wait list

customerNewEntrySubject.label: Customer new entry email subject
customerNewEntrySubject.tooltip: Subject of the email, that your customers will see when a new entry is added to the wait list

customerNewEntryTemplateId.label: Customer new entry email template
customerNewEntryTemplateId.tooltip: Template of the email, that your customers will see when a new entry is added to the wait list

statusText.email_app_not_configured: Email sender default app is not configured
